review_text: I have merely completed the wire framing tutorials of this course I gotta say it is the best course for me to start with ui and ux basic training, surely my money is not wasted :). I strongly recommend this course if you want to be pushed on the ui & ux path.

The course is really easy to follow engaging.
We also have a Facebook group where we can post our Assignments and get our doubts clarified.
This is my second paid course on Learn from Fiverr and i feel this course is totally worth it.
Downloadable resource is not available in this course at moment but i was sent link to download from Facebook group.
It's third time i purchased his course. I am very satisfied and I think every one should watch his video who want to be  UX/UI designer. Thanks for helping us.
One of the Best Course on Fiverr! absolutely worth every dollar. Great Learning Experience.
I simply love Daniel's courses.
Amazing course please Introduce advance course of adobe XD.
The course is really well done. Daniel is very nice and clear.  He goes through all the basics of XD and explains a little bit of photoshop and aftereffects. Thank you
Hi, I enjoyed learning from Daniel, he is a great teacher and I 100% recommend him!
Really Awesome Course. Just Become his fan
Dan is too much informative. sometimes you felt boring but his funny gossip makes you laugh.
it was highly informative, thanks
It's a good course for beginners, and also for midlevel designers.
its great and easy to learn
I am still watching and learning and I am in my 3rd hour of the course- it is inspiring and informative.
details are  taught in such a simple way, recommended for beginners
The course was engaging, the tutor really carried me along, awesome content!

This course is being so easy to enjoy. The instructor, Dan, explains with a lot of passion and really encourages you to be the best web designer you can be. A lot of tricks and tips, I am very happy with this purchase, I would have made the purchase of this course a million times more with no doubt. Totally recommended. Thanks Dan for this precious material.
It's the best course ever. I learned alot new things from this course.  Thanks fiverr and thanks Danny.
Awesome Experience!
It is a lot of information to retain. How ever it was well put together, taught and explained. Two thumbs up to the instructor.
Very informative and fun teacher! Learned some cool new tricks!
Great teacher

WOW!! Dan thank you so much for creating this course, it was amazing!! This is way more than what I expected.I love how you showed all the shortcuts to make working a lot faster. Thank you for all the tips and advice for using the other adobe software as well, that was very helpful. The program was well paced and I can tell that you put a lot of love and care into it. I felt like you were right here with me teaching me how to use it. I HIGHLY recommend doing this course to anyone what is brand new. You will be guided step by step. I wish you lots of success in all of your projects Dan, can't wait to do more of our courses. Take care. :-)

Great! Course very informative and beginner friendly! Nice walk through in different sections, great explanations for each section and great assignments to enhance the learning process. Well organized! Highly recommended!

Amazing course and an amazing tutor.. I learnt alot from Dan.. Thank you so much, this is going to help me improve my designs and most importantly prepare me for the career I'm dreaming of

Thanks again
Thanks for this awesome course.
It was helpful.
Wonderful course
It was an eye-opener. Love the course very much!
Really Amazing!!

Wow, Dan is Great this is my second Fiverr Corse with him,
Great experience I have full confidence now on Adobe XD and Web and Mobile UI/UX design

Thank you so much Dan
Excellent
A very comprehensive course with an amazing and competent instructor accompanying you through all the way! I highly recommend this!

A pleasant instructor who took me through a deep dive of the Adobe XD software; I don't think there's any feature that's been skipped. He also explained things outside of the software itself such as sources for public domain images, user testing and outsourcing as well as dealing with clients both as a freelancer and a UI/UX designer that actually works with a company. This course was well worth the purchase.

The course is awesome! The author explains very clearly and accessible, many examples, many independent, and, what is very important, interesting tasks. In general, the course gives a complete basic understanding of the XD the program itself, as well as the work of a web designer. Interesting design tricks are also shown.

Thank you so much Dan for sharing your knowledge to us. 
For me, all I can is that your one of the best.

Really exciting and entertaining course 
love it
10/10
like free content
Great Tutorial set for UI/UX DESIGNERS

The course is awesome and well organized.
I already know so many of these concepts but just wanted to increase my fiver ratings to earn jobs.

i think this is really nice course for the all ui ux designers. It teaches you every single thing in the most simplistic manner. More importantly the price is also really reasonable. overall a good experience. if it lacking something that was assignments projects submissions exercises and certificate.
helpful enough
I really LOVE IT :)
good

This is my first experience with a remote instructor and I liked it. Great way to receive training without having to travel great distances. I thought the course was well organized, clear and easy to follow and the instructor was very knowledgeable with excellent presentation skills.
Awesome course!!!! Really helpful for me...
it was fun and learnt a lot of important steps
It will be a lot more interesting if he provides details knowledge about how to deal with the customers and provide deep details about the web design market.

The course it self is great. The only problem is that the design kits are not there and it isn't available anywhere. I tried contacting the Customer service representative but it only adds more frustrations due to the inadequate communication channel and the response rate. Despite of some obstacles I had to go through, the information I learned was great and the Instructor HQ was amazing!!
The course is great. It contains everything I need to know about UI/UX. Thank you!

I'm giving 5 stars because Daniel really put his heart into this material. So much detail is included in this course and if you are truly interested in becoming a UX designer, then this is the course for you. 

I'm more interested in understanding the overall concept of Adobe XD. I can see Daniel doing an overview for high-level folks like me. But, if you are ready to start making some money, and committed to investing time to do and re-do the assignments, take this course. 

I really enjoyed the user testing module as he provided quick tips on how to do screen recordings which makes it more advantageous for unmoderated feedback.

In fact, Daniel includes all types of short cuts, quick tips and tricks throughout this course. And he's not just talking about Adobe XD. He talks about Photoshop, and other tools outside of XD but part of the Adobe shop.
The course is amazing
informative and skillfull
This is simply awesome.. !

This is a really good course. You can learn many things as a freelancer.
the best course right here on ui/ux design . I didn't regret it.
Wow! Just a newbie on UI/UX and I have a long way to go. A nice and explanatory course so far, definitely worth the pay.
